Map geographic points to administrative boundaries

Look up the co-ordinates of a point on Earth and find out what country, region, city, constituency, or state it lies within.

It’s also great for looking up the shapes of all those boundaries. Based on source data from the totally amazing OpenStreetMap project

Get startedDocumentation

Poplus

Poplus is an international community of activists, citizens and developers.

Together we are creating standardised, internationalised, interoperable, open-source Components, to make it easier to build websites that empower citizens, no matter where you are based.

  • MapIt
  • PopIt
  • WriteIt
  • BillIt
  • SayIt

Poplus was proudly founded by
